Name: Gimlet Cocktail (Charles H. Baker's 1939 recipe)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Boozy and very subtly flavoured and edging very slightly towards being sweet.
History: Recipe adapted from Charles H. Baker, Jr. 's 1939 The Gentleman's Companion volume II – An Exotic Drinking Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Gimlet Cocktail (Charles H. Baker's 1939 recipe) contains 159 calories
